sections.general: senior network security engineer https://www.linkedin.com/in/dilip-nr/ professional summary overall 7+ years of experience in network and security engineering which includes strong hands-on experience with palo alto firewalls, cisco asa firewalls, check point firewalls along with comprehensive working knowledge of load balancers, wireless networking, vmware and data center management. areas of expertise include designing manageable networks, threat prevention and management, routing, switching, troubleshooting network performance issues and documentation. overall 7+ years of experience in network and security engineering which includes strong hands-on experience with palo alto firewalls, cisco asa firewalls, check point firewalls along with comprehensive working knowledge of load balancers, wireless networking, vmware and data center management. areas of expertise include designing manageable networks, threat prevention and management, routing, switching, troubleshooting network performance issues and documentation.
